para_1: That the Directors of the Company be and are hereby authorised to complete and do all acts and things (including executing all relevant documents) as they may consider desirable, necessary, or expedient to give full effect to the foregoing Resolutions; and that any actions taken by the Directors prior to the date of the foregoing resolutions adopted hereby that are within the authority conferred thereby are hereby ratified, confirmed and approved as the acts and deeds of the Company.
